requirements.text: Create a new public page titled "LOVE THE LIQUID" that includes (1) a prominent title at the top and (2) an embedded view of https://ko-fi.com/painparadise on the page.

quotes: ADD monetizing FEATURES https://ko-fi.com/painparadise  CALL IT LOVE THE LIQUID
1, YES IN A BUTTON, YES, TITLE

acceptanceCriteria: A new React page component exists for the monetization page and renders a visible H1 title "LOVE THE LIQUID".
The page embeds the Ko-fi destination https://ko-fi.com/painparadise directly within the page content (e.g., via iframe/embed), and the embed loads without crashing the app.
The page is accessible without requiring authentication (consistent with existing public pages like Tips/Facts).

requirements.text: Add a clear call-to-action button on the "LOVE THE LIQUID" page that links to https://ko-fi.com/painparadise.

quotes: 1, YES IN A BUTTON, YES, TITLE

acceptanceCriteria: A button is visible on the "LOVE THE LIQUID" page and uses English user-facing text.
Clicking the button opens https://ko-fi.com/painparadise (preferably in a new tab using safe link attributes).

requirements.text: Add routing for the new "LOVE THE LIQUID" page using the existing TanStack Router pattern in frontend/src/App.tsx, with a stable, human-readable path (e.g., "/love-the-liquid") and lazy-loading like other non-landing pages.

quotes: 1, YES IN A BUTTON, YES, TITLE

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating directly to the new route path renders the "LOVE THE LIQUID" page.
The new page is lazy-loaded similarly to existing routes (e.g., Tips/Facts) and does not increase initial bundle unnecessarily.

requirements.text: Add a navigation entry for the new "LOVE THE LIQUID" page to both the desktop header navigation (frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout.tsx) and the mobile menu (frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav.tsx).

quotes: 1, YES IN A BUTTON, YES, TITLE

acceptanceCriteria: Desktop header shows a nav link that routes to the "LOVE THE LIQUID" page.
Mobile menu shows a nav link that routes to the "LOVE THE LIQUID" page and closes the menu when clicked.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing shadcn components instead).
Do not edit immutable hook files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
nonGoals: Implementing payments, subscriptions, or storing purchase/donation state in the backend.
Adding any new authentication provider beyond Internet Identity.
Building a custom checkout flow; the Ko-fi experience remains hosted by Ko-fi.
